method.name: getInheritOutputDirs
getOutputDir
method.description:
directory to store module's production classes and resources.

returns:directory to store production output. non-null if #getInheritOutputDirs() returns 'false'

method.name: getTestOutputDir
method.description:
directory to store module's test classes and resources.

returns:directory to store test output. non-null if #getInheritOutputDirs() returns 'false'

property.name: inheritOutputDirs
outputDir
property.description:
directory to store module's production classes and resources.

returns:directory to store production output. non-null if #getInheritOutputDirs() returns 'false'

property.name: testOutputDir
property.description:
directory to store module's test classes and resources.

returns:directory to store test output. non-null if #getInheritOutputDirs() returns 'false'
